scripts.dev: echo 'Use npm run dev:all to run both backend and frontend'
scripts.dev:all: node -e "(async()=>{const {spawn}=await import('node:child_process'); const a=spawn('npx',[ '--yes','vercel','dev','--port','3000','--confirm' ],{stdio:'inherit'}); const f=spawn('npm',[ 'run','dev','--prefix','frontend' ],{stdio:'inherit'}); a.on('exit', code=>process.exitCode=code||0); f.on('exit', code=>process.exitCode=(process.exitCode||0)||(code||0));})();"
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend ci && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.start: echo 'Use npm run dev:all to start both backend and frontend'
